resources.string: Ignore package name restriction (check if you changed Gboard package name, otherwise ignore)
Clipboard retention time, default 3 days, in milliseconds

After applying, Gboard needs to be restarted
First-time application requires phone restart
https://github.com/NanashiTheNameless/GboardHook

Original is by chenyue404
